Ready or Not? (40-75 points)
Sarah, you're swooning. You stop. You're tingling. You take a break. I can tell you've spent tons of time pondering your prospects and your romantic readiness, but you're not quite sure it's time for a love thing. Hey, there's nothing bad about that. Maybe it's 'cause somewhere way back in your Can I Deal With boy's? closet, you've felt the bruises of a bad breakup or some immature boy's hookup-and-run game.(AMEN) Maybe you're just really into your friends. It won't be long before you're ready to experience romance at it's realest. Keep in mind that being one half of an "us" takes a lot more than a tin of Altoids, it takes work! Start looking behind the eyelashes of cuties who could have more-than-friends potential. When you find out what those boys are all about and you feel that you're ready, you'll probably already have Mr. Amazing picked out (like______ perhaps?)
